title: Date of birth details - Welsh translation required
hint:
Fe ddefnyddir y manylion hyn i symud eich hawliad yn ei flaen.

Er enghraifft, 23 04 1981

dobDate.dayRequired: Enter a day for your date of birth. For example, 23 - Welsh translation required
dobDate.monthRequired: Enter a month for your date of birth. For example, 04 - Welsh translation required
dobDate.yearRequired: Enter a year for your date of birth. For example, 1981 - Welsh translation required
dobDate.dayNotANumber: Day must only contain numbers. For example, 23 - Welsh translation required
dobDate.monthNotANumber: Month must only contain numbers. For example, 04 - Welsh translation required
dobDate.yearNotANumber: Year must only contain numbers. For example, 1981 - Welsh translation required
dobDate.dayInvalid: Date of birth must be a real date. - Welsh translation required
dobDate.monthInvalid: Date of birth must be a real date. - Welsh translation required
dobDate.yearInvalid: Date of birth must be a real date. - Welsh translation required
dobDate.invalidDate: Date of birth must be a real date. - Welsh translation required
dobDate.invalidDateInFuture: Date entered must be in the past. - Welsh translation required
dobDate.invalidDateTooFarInPast: Date must be between 10 years and 100 years in the past. - Welsh translation required
dobDate.invalidDateTooRecent: Date must be between 10 years and 100 years in the past. - Welsh translation required
